headline.main: KOIVISTO ISLANDS CLAIMED BY FINNS; Russians Reported Driven Off Last of Nation's Soil Except Hangoe Naval Base

lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, Nov. 4 (U.P.) -- Finnish troops have occupied the strategic Koivisto Islands in the Gulf of Finland, driving Russian forces from all former Finnish soil except the Hangoe naval base near Helsinki, it was announced officially today.
abstract: Finns claim Koivisto Islands, Finland Gulf; claim USSR troops driven off all Finnish soil except Hangoe naval base; USSR planes bomb Helsinki; Finns continue Murmansk drive
